short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly read out loud Google Search Results.  Helpful for the visually impared who can have truble finding answers in Google.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visually impared people can have trubble finding stuff on the web.  This extension is made to make this proces easier.  It will read out your search results out loud, allowing you to find your answer faster and more efficiently.
